metadata.name: The Agreement
metadata.description:
An exploration of bodies in space.  Four hardened flesh warriors traverse a park in Los Angeles.  The group is dependent on one another to maintain its existence and achieve its goals.  Together they move, relentless and na√Øve.  Not every member contributes equally yet they all rely on each other to survive.  They're all they know. 

Nude Robot is a 3D artist currently residing in Los Angeles.  Maker of porous experiences which blend reality and 3D together, he draws heavily from the unseen forces around us, creating inside out worlds from our cultural archive.

Also known for directing work, he has collaborated with top artists such as Bad Bunny, Young Thug, Don Diablo, and Kanye West.
